GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: retrieve an article by its ID

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a new comment to the specified article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article's vote property by article_id

article.title: Living in a shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the given comment by comment_id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
